description: Vanilla has powerful antioxidant properties, which help in scavenging free radical damage and reduce the risk of almost all chronic inflammatory diseases such as heart disease, diabetes and cancer.
Vanilla has mild anesthetic and analgesic properties, which help in relieving common pains such as sore throat, toothache and headache.
Vanilla has appetite suppressing properties which help in reducing hunger pangs and assist you in reaching your weight loss goal.
Vanilla has been used as traditional medicine for vomiting and stomach upsets.Vanilla is widely used in cosmetic and skin care industries for its fragrance and anti-ageing benefits.
